de.mrapp.android.util

Class ThemeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.ThemeUtil

  • public final class ThemeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which provides static methods for retrieving theme attributes.
    Since:
    1.4.8

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public static int getColor(@NonNull
                           android.content.Context context,
                           @AttrRes
                           int resourceId)
        Obtains the color, which corresponds to a specific resource id, from a context's theme. If the given resource id is invalid, a Resources.NotFoundException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        resourceId - The resource id of the attribute, which should be obtained, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid theme attribute
        Returns:
        The color, which has been obtained, as an Integer value

      • getColor

        public static int getColor(@NonNull
                           android.content.Context context,
                           @StyleRes
                           int themeResourceId,
                           @AttrRes
                           int resourceId)
        Obtains the color, which corresponds to a specific resource id, from a specific theme. If the given resource id is invalid, a Resources.NotFoundException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        themeResourceId - The resource id of the theme, the attribute should be obtained from, as an Integer value or -1, if the attribute should be obtained from the given context's theme
        resourceId - The resource id of the attribute, which should be obtained, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid theme attribute
        Returns:
        The color, which has been obtained, as an Integer value

      • getFraction

        public static float getFraction(@NonNull
                                android.content.Context context,
                                @AttrRes
                                int resourceId,
                                int base,
                                int pbase)
        Obtains the fraction, which corresponds to a specific resource id, from a context's theme. If the given resource id is invalid, a Resources.NotFoundException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        resourceId - The resource id of the attribute, which should be obtained, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid theme attribute
        base - The base value of this fraction as an Integer value. A standard fraction is multiplied by this value
        pbase - The parent base value of this fraction as an Integer value. A parent fraction (nn%p) is multiplied by this value
        Returns:
        The fraction, which has been obtained, as a Float value

      • getFraction

        public static float getFraction(@NonNull
                                android.content.Context context,
                                @StyleRes
                                int themeResourceId,
                                @AttrRes
                                int resourceId,
                                int base,
                                int pbase)
        Obtains the fraction, which corresponds to a specific resource id, from a specific theme. If the given resource id is invalid, a Resources.NotFoundException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        themeResourceId - The resource id of the theme, the attribute should be obtained from, as an Integer value or -1, if the attribute should be obtained from the given context's theme
        resourceId - The resource id of the attribute, which should be obtained, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid theme attribute
        base - The base value of this fraction as an Integer value. A standard fraction is multiplied by this value
        pbase - The parent base value of this fraction as an Integer value. A parent fraction (nn%p) is multiplied by this value
        Returns:
        The fraction, which has been obtained, as a Float value

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @AttrRes
                                 int resourceId)
        Obtains the boolean value, which corresponds to a specific resource id, from a context's theme.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        resourceId - The resource id of the attribute, which should be obtained, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid theme attribute
        Returns:
        The boolean value, which has been obtained, as an Boolean value or false, if the given resource id is invalid
